locations.clue_value: A dark coat was seen near the museum.
locations.name: Museo de Bellas Artes
locations.npc_dialogue: I saw a figure in a dark coat, sketching the paintings. It felt... off.

locations.clue_value: The artist's style contrasts with the thief's method.
locations.name: Plaza de la Virgen
locations.npc_dialogue: The artist here is known for his vibrant colors, but he often paints in shadows.

locations.clue_value: A rare dish mentioned could link to the suspect's favorite food.
locations.name: Central Market
locations.npc_dialogue: I overheard someone talking about a rare food that only a true connoisseur would know.

locations.clue_value: The woman had a unique hairstyle that stood out.
locations.name: Vieux Port
locations.npc_dialogue: A woman with striking hair was seen near the docks, sketching the boats.

locations.clue_value: The thief's culinary preferences might reveal their identity.
locations.name: Le Panier
locations.npc_dialogue: There's a rumor about a thief who loves Mediterranean cuisine.

locations.clue_value: The suspect was in a rush, possibly to avoid detection.
locations.name: Musée des Civilisations de l'Europe et de la Méditerranée
locations.npc_dialogue: I saw someone sketching the exhibits, but they left in a hurry.

locations.clue_value: The suspect's behavior was suspicious, focusing on escape routes.
locations.name: Palazzo Ducale
locations.npc_dialogue: A tall figure was seen admiring the art, but they seemed too interested in the exits.

locations.clue_value: The vehicle could be a key to identifying the suspect.
locations.name: Via Garibaldi
locations.npc_dialogue: I heard someone mention a rare vehicle that only a few can afford.

locations.clue_value: The wrapper could link to the suspect's favorite food.
locations.name: Aquarium of Genoa
locations.npc_dialogue: An artist was sketching the sea life, but they left behind a peculiar food wrapper.

description: In the heart of the Mediterranean, a series of art thefts have left the local galleries in disarray. As whispers of a notorious thief resurface, you must navigate through the vibrant streets of three cities to uncover the truth. Each location holds a piece of the puzzle, but beware—misleading clues and deceptive suspects lurk in the shadows.

reasoning_chain: Witness accounts consistently describe a female artist with red hair.
Clara's hobby of sketching aligns with the descriptions from multiple locations.
The favorite food of seafood paella matches the clues found in Valencia and Genoa.
The vehicle type, a vintage Vespa, is unique and ties back to Clara's character.

solution: Connect the clues about the red-haired artist's sketching habits and her favorite food to identify Clara Moreau as the thief.

suspect_database.background: An art student with a penchant for the dramatic.
suspect_database.motive: Desire to fund her studies through art theft.
suspect_database.name: Clara Moreau

suspect_database.background: A chef with a secret life as a thief.
suspect_database.motive: Financial troubles led him to crime.
suspect_database.name: Julien Dupont

suspect_database.background: A photographer who captures the beauty of art.
suspect_database.motive: To gain fame through controversial means.
suspect_database.name: Sofia Rossi

suspect_database.background: An antique dealer with a shady past.
suspect_database.motive: To fund his collection through theft.
suspect_database.name: Marco Bellini

title: Shadows of the Past
